  • Constructor Details

    • MapGenerator

      public MapGenerator(double edgeDensity, int numberOfLocations, boolean unidirectional)
      Constructor method that creates a map
      Parameters:
      edgeDensity - density of edges
      numberOfLocations - number of locations in the map
      unidirectional - type of paths
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if edgeDensity is not between 0 and 1, or numberOfLocations is not positive

  • Method Details

    • generateLocations

      public void generateLocations()
      Generates the locations of the map Each Location is represented by a character
      Specified by:
      generateLocations in interface MapGeneratorADT

    • generateEdges

      public void generateEdges()
      Generates the edges of the map. Each edge has a random weight between 1 and 15. The number of edges is determined by the edge density.
      Specified by:
      generateEdges in interface MapGeneratorADT

    • isDensityValid

      public boolean isDensityValid(double density)
      Checks if the edge density is valid
      Specified by:

      Parameters:
      density - edge density
      Returns:
      true if density is valid, false otherwise
